section_name: 21.10.1 Set the parameters of a listening host
summary: This endpoint sets the configuration parameters for a single, specific listening host identified by its ID. This includes URL, protocol, authentication, and event subscription details.

request.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<HttpHostNotification xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema" version="2.0">

<id>
test
</id>
<url>
test
</url>
<protocolType>
HTTP
</protocolType>
<parameterFormatType>
JSON
</parameterFormatType>
<addressingFormatType>
hostname
</addressingFormatType>
<hostName>
test
</hostName>
<host>
test
</host>
<ipv6Address>
test
</ipv6Address>
<portNo>
1
</portNo>
<userName>
test
</userName>
<password>
test
</password>
<httpAuthenticationMethod>
MD5digest
</httpAuthenticationMethod>
<ANPR>

<detectionUpLoadPicturesType>
all
</detectionUpLoadPicturesType>
</ANPR>
<Extensions>

<intervalBetweenEvents>
1
</intervalBetweenEvents>
</Extensions>
<uploadImagesDataType>
URL
</uploadImagesDataType>
<httpBroken>
true
</httpBroken>
<SubscribeEvent>

<heartbeat>
30
</heartbeat>
<eventMode>
all
</eventMode>
<EventList>

<Event>

<type>
mixedTargetDetection
</type>
<minorAlarm>
0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403
</minorAlarm>
<minorException>
0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403
</minorException>
<minorOperation>
0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403
</minorOperation>
<minorEvent>
0x01,0x02,0x03,0x04
</minorEvent>
<pictureURLType>
binary
</pictureURLType>
<channels>
1,2,3,4
</channels>
</Event>
</EventList>
<channels>
1,2,3,4
</channels>
<pictureURLType>
binary
</pictureURLType>
<ChangedUploadSub>

<interval>
5
</interval>
<StatusSub>

<all>
true
</all>
<channel>
true
</channel>
<hd>
true
</hd>
<capability>
true
</capability>
</StatusSub>
</ChangedUploadSub>
</SubscribeEvent>
<PackingSpaceRecognition>

<upLoadPicturesType>
all
</upLoadPicturesType>
<PicturesTypes>

<picturesType>
backgroundImage
</picturesType>
</PicturesTypes>
</PackingSpaceRecognition>
</HttpHostNotification>

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ResponseStatus xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema" version="2.0">

<requestURL>
null
</requestURL>
<statusCode>
0
</statusCode>
<statusString>
OK
</statusString>
<subStatusCode>
OK
</subStatusCode>
</ResponseStatus>

section_name: 21.10.2 Get parameters of all listening hosts

response.body:

section_name: 21.10.3 Set IP address of receiving server(s)
summary: Sets the parameters for all listening hosts in a single request, effectively defining the IP addresses and other configurations for servers that receive event notifications.

request.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<HttpHostNotificationList xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema" version="2.0">

section_name: 21.10.9 Get the capabilities of listening hosts parameters
summary: Retrieves the capabilities of the device for configuring HTTP listening hosts, including supported protocols, formats, and event subscription options.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<HttpHostNotificationCap xmlns="http://www.isapi.org/ver20/XMLSchema" version="2.0">

<hostNumber>
0
</hostNumber>
<urlLen max="10">
test
</urlLen>
<url>
test
</url>
<protocolType opt="HTTP,HTTPS,EHome">
HTTP
</protocolType>
<parameterFormatType opt="XML,querystring,JSON">
XML
</parameterFormatType>
<addressingFormatType opt="host,hostname">
host
</addressingFormatType>
<hostName min="1" max="64">
test
</hostName>
<host opt="ipv4,ipv6">
test
</host>
<portNo min="0" max="10">
1
</portNo>
<userNameLen min="0" max="10">
1
</userNameLen>
<passwordLen min="0" max="10">
1
</passwordLen>
<httpAuthenticationMethod opt="MD5digest,none,base64">
MD5digest
</httpAuthenticationMethod>
<ANPR>

<detectionUpLoadPicturesType opt="test">
test
</detectionUpLoadPicturesType>
<alarmHttpPushProtocol opt="baseline,custom">
baseline
</alarmHttpPushProtocol>
</ANPR>
<HttpHostUploadCtrl>

<postDataTypes>
test
</postDataTypes>
<epoliceDataTypes>
test
</epoliceDataTypes>
<eventDataTypes>
test
</eventDataTypes>
<evidenceDataTypes>
test
</evidenceDataTypes>
<uploadInterval min="1" max="2000">
0
</uploadInterval>
<uploadTimeout min="1" max="6000">
0
</uploadTimeout>
<noPlateUploadEnabled opt="true,false">
true
</noPlateUploadEnabled>
<historyEnabled opt="true,false">
true
</historyEnabled>
<uploadTimePlan>

<enabled opt="true,false">
true
</enabled>
<timeList>

<timeSpan>

<timeId min="0" max="1">
0
</timeId>
<startHour min="0" max="23">
0
</startHour>
<startMinute min="0" max="59">
0
</startMinute>
<endHour min="0" max="23">
0
</endHour>
<endMinute min="0" max="59">
0
</endMinute>
</timeSpan>
</timeList>
</uploadTimePlan>
</HttpHostUploadCtrl>
<Extensions>

<intervalBetweenEvents min="0" max="10">
0
</intervalBetweenEvents>
</Extensions>
<uploadImagesDataType opt="URL,binary">
URL
</uploadImagesDataType>
<httpBroken opt="true,false" def="true">
true
</httpBroken>
<SubscribeEventCap>
test
<heartbeat min="0" max="10">
1
</heartbeat>
<channelMode opt="all,list">
all
</channelMode>
<eventMode opt="all,list">
all
</eventMode>
<EventList>

<Event>
test
<type>
AccessControllerEvent
</type>
<minorAlarm opt="0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403">
0x400,0x401
</minorAlarm>
<minorException opt="0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403">
0x400,0x401
</minorException>
<minorOperation opt="0x400,0x401,0x402,0x403">
0x400,0x401
</minorOperation>
<minorEvent opt="0x01,0x02,0x03,0x04">
0x400,0x401
</minorEvent>
<pictureURLType opt="binary,localURL,cloudStorageURL,EZVIZURL" def="cloudStorageURL">
cloudStorageURL
</pictureURLType>
</Event>
</EventList>
<pictureURLType opt="binary,localURL,cloudStorageURL,EZVIZURL" def="cloudStorageURL">
cloudStorageURL
</pictureURLType>
<ChangedUploadSub>
0
<interval>
1
</interval>
<StatusSub>
true
<all>
true
</all>
<channel>
true
</channel>
<hd>
true
</hd>
<capability>
true
</capability>
</StatusSub>
</ChangedUploadSub>
</SubscribeEventCap>
<PackingSpaceRecognition>

<upLoadPicturesType opt="all,picturesTypes,notUpload" def="all">
all
</upLoadPicturesType>
<PicturesTypes size="2">

<picturesType opt="backgroundImage,plateImage">
backgroundImage
</picturesType>
</PicturesTypes>
</PackingSpaceRecognition>
</HttpHostNotificationCap>

summary: Deletes all configured HTTP listening hosts (receiving servers).

null
</requestURL>
<statusCode>
0
</statusCode>
<statusString>
OK
</statusString>
<subStatusCode>
OK
</subStatusCode>
</ResponseStatus>
